import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../Css/InsurancePage.css"; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; function InsurancePage() { const [form, setForm] = useState({ fullName: "", area: "", totalLandArea: "", landOwnership: "Owned", phone: "", farmLocation: "", cropToInsure: "", cropVariety: "", expectedSowing: "", expectedHarvest: "", pastCropHistory: "", govIdNumber: "", aadhaar: "", bankAccount: "", ifsc: "", coverageType: "", landDoc: null, idProof: null, previousPolicy: null, agree: false, }); const [submitting, setSubmitting] = useState(false); const [showSuccess, setShowSuccess] = useState(false); const onChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setForm((s) => ({ ...s, [name]: type === "checkbox" ? checked : value })); }; const onFile = (e) => { const { name, files } = e.target; setForm((s) => ({ ...s, [name]: files?.[0] ?? null })); }; const validate = () => { if (!form.fullName || !form.phone || !form.aadhaar) return alert("Please fill Full Name, Phone and Aadhaar."); if (!form.cropToInsure || !form.totalLandArea) return alert("Please fill crop and land information."); if (!form.landDoc || !form.idProof) return alert("Please upload required documents."); if (!form.agree) return alert("Please accept the declaration."); return true; }; const handleSubmit = async () => { if (!validate()) return; const fd = new FormData(); const textFields = [ "fullName", "area", "totalLandArea", "landOwnership", "phone", "farmLocation", "cropToInsure", "cropVariety", "expectedSowing", "expectedHarvest", "pastCropHistory", "govIdNumber", "aadhaar", "bankAccount", "ifsc", "coverageType", ]; textFields.forEach((t) => fd.append(t, form[t] || "")); fd.append("landDoc", form.landDoc); fd.append("idProof", form.idProof); if (form.previousPolicy) fd.append("previousPolicy", form.previousPolicy); try { setSubmitting(true); const res = await fetch("http://localhost:9090/backend/api/insurance/apply", { method: "POST", body: fd, }); if (res.ok) { setShowSuccess(true); } else { alert("Submission failed."); } } catch (error) { console.error(error); alert("Network error."); } finally { setSubmitting(false); } }; return ( <>
